subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The district attorney for Onondaga County, N.Y., said he believed the men who accused Fine of sexually abusing them as boys were telling the truth, but the statute of limitations had run out.
snippet: The district attorney for Onondaga County, N.Y., said he believed the men who accused Fine of sexually abusing them as boys were telling the truth, but the statute of limitations had run out.
